TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit XamlAccessLevel extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines access control to assemblies and types for purposes of XAML loading.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Static methods of XamlAccessLevel return instances of XamlAccessLevel, based on input. This is the only way to generate a XamlAccessLevel value (the constructor is private).
XamlAccessLevel is generally only used in conjunction with <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel AssemblyAccessTo(class System.Reflection.Assembly assembly) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a instance based on an assembly requested by <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>.
Docs.returns: A instance, with the value used as source information for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.AssemblyAccessToAssemblyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Docs.value: A instance, with the value used as source information for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.AssemblyAccessToAssemblyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel AssemblyAccessTo(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName assemblyName) cil managed

Docs.param: The assembly name for the request.
Docs.summary: Returns a instance based on an assembly requested by <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>.
Docs.returns: A instance, with the value used as source information for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.AssemblyAccessToAssemblyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Docs.exception: is not a valid fully qualified assembly name.
Docs.value: A instance, with the value used as source information for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.AssemblyAccessToAssemblyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

Docs.summary: Gets the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> of the assembly for which this determines permissions.
Docs.value: The <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> of the assembly for which this determines permissions.
Docs.returns: The <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> of the assembly for which this determines permissions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel PrivateAccessTo(string assemblyQualifiedTypeName) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that is parsed as an assembly-qualified type name.
Docs.summary: Returns a instance based on a specific type specified by its qualified name.
Docs.returns: A instance, with the value used as source information for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.PrivateAccessToTypeName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.AssemblyAccessToAssemblyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> determined by reflection on the type.
Docs.exception:
is not a valid assembly-qualified type name.
-or-
Assembly name within is not a valid assembly name.
Docs.value: A instance, with the value used as source information for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.PrivateAccessToTypeName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.AssemblyAccessToAssemblyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> determined by reflection on the type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel PrivateAccessTo(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a instance based on a specific type specified by <xref:System.Type>.
Docs.returns: A instance, with the value used as source information for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.PrivateAccessToTypeName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.AssemblyAccessToAssemblyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> determined by reflection on the type.
Docs.value: A instance, with the value used as source information for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.PrivateAccessToTypeName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.AssemblyAccessToAssemblyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> determined by reflection on the type.

Docs.summary: Gets the unqualified string name of the type for which this determines permissions.
Docs.value: The unqualified string name of the type for which this determines permissions.
Docs.returns: The unqualified string name of the type for which this determines permissions.
